entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:39 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers beginning late this afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 early this evening then light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
